original_title: NPP secures 8 seats, SJB secures 3 in Ratnapura
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Ratnapura District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 61% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 368,229 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 133,041 votes (22.31%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 8 seats in the district while the SJB has won 3 seats in the district.
